typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		empName as string,
		age as string,
		Deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empData
empData sort(desc(empName, true),
	caseInsensitive: true) ~> SortOnNames
SortOnNames sink(input(
		empid as string,
		empName as string,
		age as string,
		Deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SortByNames.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink
